AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffSlowdownMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: amount that the AI is slowed down e.g. 2.0 means that it will take the AI twice as long between updates as 1.0

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffDistractionTime
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: amount of time spent in distraction topic

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffSettlementOccupationCooldown
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: amount of time that the AI has to wait after getting visibility on a settlement before it can build on it

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffTimeBetweenMultiShotPowerShots
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: amount of time between multi shot power shots

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffFocusFireOnWoundedEnemies
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI controlled squads will focus fire on weakened enemies to the degree specified (1.0 is fully focus fire while 0.0 is fully unfocussed fire

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffKitingDistance
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How far should a squad kite outside of its enemies range

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseKiteBehavior
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Kite behavior micro is active (1.0) or inactive (0.0)

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUsePullbackMicro
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Pullback micro is active (1.0) or inactive (0.0)

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseHoldGroundMicro
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Hold Ground micro is active (1.0) or inactive (0.0)

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseLeaveOrStayInAreaMicro
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Micro that tells squads to get into areas (smoke, shield, med-drones, cloak, heling fountain, healers location) or out of an area (cleansing beam location, mac blast location, smoke) is active (1.0) or inactive (0.0)

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffSendAutoDetectorMissions
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Send (1.0) or dont send (0.0) scout missions to detect cloaked units when no other detectors are around or on their way

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoBuildTurrets
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Build (1.0) or dont build (0.0) turrets in response to base attacks

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoTurretEnemyPopThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How much attacking enemy pop do you need at your base per auto turret built or upgraded

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffPullbackMicroThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Percentage of a squads health under which they begin using the pull back micro

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffSendAutoDefendMissions
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI can send auto defend missions (1.0) or not (0.0). This is for campaign only as in skirmish this variable will always be on

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffRampUpAutoDefendMissions
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI can ramp up auto defend missions (1.0) or not (0.0). This is for skirmish only as in campaign this variable will always be off

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoDefendMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: By how much should the enemy outnumber us before we start ramping up an auto defend mission. 1.5 for easy, 0.75 for legendary

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoDefendMissionNumberMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: By how much should our auto defend mission outnumber the attacking enemies (number of counter squads)

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoDefendMissionStrengthMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: By how much should our auto defend mission outpower the attacking enemies (strength of counter squads)

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoGenerateHealer
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI can generate a healer squad (1.0) or not (0.0) if ally squads are under 70% health and there is no other healer on the map.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoGenerateBuildingBids
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI can generate building bids if the strategy table buildings have been exhausted.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoGenerateTechBids
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI can generate tech bids if the strategy table techs have been exhausted.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoGenerateLeaderPowersBids
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI can generate leader powers bids if the strategy table leader powers have been exhausted.

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoTechBidPowerThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Once the AI gets above this power threshold it will bid on techs despite their prereqs

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoBuildingBidPowerThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Once the AI gets above this power threshold it will bid on buildings despite their prereqs

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoBuildingBidResourceThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Once the AI gets above this resource threshold it will bid on buildings despite their prereqs

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoLeaderPowersBidPowerThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Once the AI gets above this power threshold it will bid on leader powers despite their prereqs

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoLeaderPowersBidResourceThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Once the AI gets above this resource threshold it will bid on leader powers despite their prereqs

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffOverHeal
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI assigns too many healers to an injured squad (1.0) or not (0.0).

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffOverKill
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI assigns too many y ability attackers to a squad (1.0) or not (0.0).

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffGlobalHealingCoverage
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI gets healers to heal squads throughout the entire map as opposed to immidiately around the healer (1.0) or not (0.0).

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffTargetHeroUnitsWithGrenades
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI attacks hero units that are within range with y ability grenades (1.0) or not (0.0).

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMineBaseExits
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI squads that can drop mines drop them right in front of the enemy base exit (1.0) or not (0.0).

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffExpandMineFieldTowardsEnemy
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI squads that can drop mines create mine fields that expand towards the enemy (1.0) or not (0.0).

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffBaitEnemyIntoMines
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: AI attacks hero units that are within range with y ability grenades (1.0) or not (0.0).

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffChainAbilities
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Chain usage of smoke bombs, disruption fields, and shroud cloaks

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffShootDownDetectors
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI shoot down detectors that are near its squads that have cloaking ability

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseGroupUpMicro
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI avoid having stragglers by having squads going to the same areas group up

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffRecycleDoomedBuildings
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI recycle buildings that are about to be destroyed anyway

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUsePushAdvantageMicro
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI push its advantage when possible i.e. attack nearby non target squads/buildings when it will most likely win

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffPushAdvantageMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 0.1 if you want to push the advantage only when heavely outnumbering the enemy, 1.0 if you want your squads to push the advantage even if you are equally matched, 2.0 if you want them to push the advantage even when the enemy are twice as strong as your local squads

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseRushStrategies
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI use Rush strategies

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseBoomStrategies
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI use Boom strategies

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseFastTechStrategies
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI use FastTech strategies

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseTurtleStrategies
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI use Turtle strategies

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseMapControlStrategies
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI use MapControl strategies

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffUseBoomStrategiesInTeamGames
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Should the AI use Boom strategies in team games

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaximumUberUnits
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum number of Uber units an AI Agent should have on the field at any one time

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaximumShroudUnits
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum number of Shroud units an AI Agent should have on the field at any one time

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaximumEngineerRatio
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum ratio of healer (Engineer) units that an AI Agent should have on the field at any one time

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaximumNightingaleRatio
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum ratio of healer (Nightingale) units that an AI Agent should have on the field at any one time

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffYAbilityCooldownTime
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Number of seconds between AI squads using Y abilities

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoGarrisonCooldownTime
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Number of seconds between AI squads jumping into an empty garrison when attacked

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoDefendRadius
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How far away from a base or other target should we be looking for enemies when judging whether or not to send out an auto defend mission

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoTurretRadius
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How far away from a base or other target should we be looking for enemies when judging whether or not to auto build/upgrade turrets

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoRampUpRadius
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How far away from a base or other target should we be looking for enemies when judging whether or not to ramp up the auto defend mission

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffRetreatRadius
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How far away from a squad should we consider when judging whether or not that squad should retreat

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffLeaderPowerCooldownTime
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Additional number of seconds between AI using leader powers. This is an extra cooldown added onto each leader powers usual cooldown

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffLeaderPowerFrequencyLimitTime
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: This variable limits how much a player will be hit by enemy leader powers. With output set to 15 the player can be hit by enemy leader powers at most once per 15 seconds

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffLeaderPowerCastResourceThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The threshold at which our resource level must be in order to prioritize saving resources for casting leader powers

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffLeaderPowerCastPowerThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The threshold at which our power level must be in order to prioritize saving resources for casting leader powers

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffLeaderPowerCastPopulationThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The threshold at which our population level must be in order to prioritize saving resources for casting leader powers

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffPopulationLimit
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum number of squads the AI Agent will train before the enemy passes this limit e.g. on easy the AI Agent will train up to 15 squads. It will then wait until the enemy has trained more than 15 before it continues training

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaxMainBases
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum number of main bases the AI Agent can have

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaxMiniBases
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum number of minibases the AI Agent can have

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaxStrongholdBases
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum number of bases the AI Agent can have while playing stronholds

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaxCapturePointsToCapture
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum number of capture points the AI Agent can explicitly capture. This will stop the AI sending missions out to capture capture points but it wont stop the AI capturing those that it coincidentally has idle squads beside

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaxEnergyPointsToCapture
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The maximum number of energy points the AI Agent can explicitly capture. This will stop the AI sending missions out to capture energy points but it wont stop the AI capturing those that it coincidentally has idle squads beside

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffNumberConcurrentAutoAIAttackDefendMissions
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The number of main missions that AutoAI will make sure are in play once it kicks in

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffNumberConcurrentAutoAIScoutMissions
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The number of scout missions that AutoAI will make sure are in play once it kicks in

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffNumberConcurrentAutoAIForageMissions
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: The number of forage missions that AutoAI will make sure are in play once it kicks in

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffBuildingPlacementRandomness
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Randomness of the placement of the buildings built e.g. 0.0 lets production buildings be built at the rear of the base all of the time

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAddedTimeFromCanDispatchToActualDispatch
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How many extra seconds is each mission to wait before dispatching in auto toned down missions

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffNewBaseBuildingEnemyPresenceThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How much enemy population needs to be around a settlement before we do not start building new a base building on it

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffLeaderPowerAimAccuracy
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: this decides how good of a shot the AI is with the damage dealing leader powers. 0.0 is dead accurate while 20.0 can miss by up to 20 meters

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffDefaultRangeOfRandomSquadsToSendOnAutoMissions
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: On Auto defend missions what range of squads do we want being sent. 0.1 would be very specific counters while 1.0 would be a bit of everything

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffQuickReactAutoMissionPopulationThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: If the AI is sending an auto mission out to a group of enemies below this population threshold then it is considered a quick react mission

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAutoAttackClusterPopThreshold
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Only send auto attack / ramp up missions to capture points, bases, and clusters of enemy squads above this threshold

AIDifficultySetting.Name: EconMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 1.00 = no econ change, 0.0 means no supplies, 2.0 means double normal supplies

DataPoint.Comment: On easy, AI gets 50% normal supplies
On legendary, AI gets 133% normal supplies
On hyper-legendary, AI gets 233% normal supplies

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DamageGivenMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 2.0 means the AI's units inflict double damage

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DamageTakenMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 2.0 means the AI's units TAKE double damage. High values are easy, low are hard.

DataPoint.Comment: On legendary, AI takes 75%% normal damage
On legendary, AI takes 40% normal damage

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffWithinRangeOfTargetCourageBoost
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: When squads are near a base or a capture point what boost is given them to reduce their chances of retreat

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMissionsCanRetreat
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Missions can (1.0) or cannot (0.0) retreat

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffChanceOfRetreatWhenOutgunned
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: Likelyhood that they will retreat when outgunned

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffRetreatMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: 0.1 if you want to only retreat when heavely outnumbered, 1.0 if you want your squads to run even if you are equally matched, 2.0 if you want them to run even when they are twice as strong as their opponents

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffAddedTimeFromCanBuildToActualBuild
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How many extra seconds is each building to wait before construction on it actually starts

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaxTurretsPerBase
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How many turrets/siege turrets can be at any one base

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaxCloaksPerBase
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How many cloaks can be at any one base

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaxShieldsPerBase
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How many shields can be at any one base

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMaxWatchTowersPerBase
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: How many watch towers can be at any one base

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffBuildingMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: reduction in number of specified buildings built as difficulty decreases e.g. if in the strategy table we ask for 2 supply depos then with DiffBuildingMultiplier of 1.0 then we get them, but with DiffBuildingMultiplier of 0.5 we only get 1

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffBuildingUpgradeMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: reduction in number of specified building upgrades being built as difficulty decreases e.g. if in the strategy table we ask for base upgrade 1, 2 and 3, on easy only the first one will be researched

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffLeaderPowerMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: reduction in number of specified leader power being called as difficulty decreases e.g. if in the strategy table we ask for a leader power to be called 2 times then with DiffLeaderPowerMultiplier of 1.0 then it will be called twice, but with DiffLeaderPowerMultiplier of 0.5 it will only be called once

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffTechMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: reduction in number of specified techs being researched as difficulty decreases e.g. if in the strategy table we ask for pop cap upgrade 1 and 2, on easy only the first one will be researched

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMissionMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: reduction in number of missions as difficulty decreases. Will not remove attack missions that target bases or capture points

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMissionSquadMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: reduction in number of specified squads to train for a mission as difficulty decreases e.g. if in the strategy table we ask for 8 grunt squads to be sent on a mission then with DiffMissionSquadMultiplier of 1.0 then we get them, but with DiffMissionSquadMultiplier of 0.5 we only get 4

AIDifficultySetting.Name: DiffMissionTargetMultiplier
AIDifficultySetting.Comment: reduction in number of targets a mission has as difficulty decreases e.g. if in the strategy table we ask for a mission with 8 targets then with DiffMissionTargetMultiplier of 1.0 then we get them, but with DiffMissionTargetMultiplier of 0.5 only 4 targets are visited
